title: SZA Shares New Songs “Take You Down,” “PSA,” and More: Listen
description: Ahead of her appearance at the Super Bowl LIX halftime show, she added four new tracks to SOS Deluxe: Lana
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: Ahead of her appearance at the Super Bowl LIX halftime show, she added four new tracks to SOS Deluxe: Lana
text: SZA is Kendrick Lamar’s special guest for tonight’s Super Bowl LIX halftime show, and she’s preceding the performance with four new songs. An updated version of “Joni” featuring Don Toliver, “Take You Down,” “PSA,” and “Open Arms (Just SZA)” have all been tacked on to SOS Deluxe: Lana. Find the tracks below.SZA released her highly anticipated SOS expansion, Lana, in December. The deluxe album includes “Saturn” and a new Kendrick Lamar collaboration called “30 for 30.” A little more than a month after releasing it, SZA won the 2025 Grammy Award for Best R&B Song for “Saturn.”Later tonight, SZA joins Kendrick Lamar, her longtime collaborator and former label-mate on Top Dawg Entertainment, at the Super Bowl halftime show. They recently reunited on Lamar’s surprise album GNX and the aforementioned Lana cut. Starting in April, Lamar and SZA will head out together on the Grand National Tour for a number of huge stadium concerts.SZA stars with Keke Palmer in the new movie One of Them Days. Read Alphonse Pierre’s review of the film, “SZA and Keke Palmer Aim to Join the Buddy-Comedy Canon,” on the Pitch.
html:
SZA is Kendrick Lamar’s special guest for tonight’s Super Bowl LIX halftime show, and she’s preceding the performance with four new songs. An updated version of “Joni” featuring Don Toliver, “Take You Down,” “PSA,” and “Open Arms (Just SZA)” have all been tacked on to SOS Deluxe: Lana. Find the tracks below.

SZA released her highly anticipated SOS expansion, Lana, in December. The deluxe album includes “Saturn” and a new Kendrick Lamar collaboration called “30 for 30.” A little more than a month after releasing it, SZA won the 2025 Grammy Award for Best R&B Song for “Saturn.”

Later tonight, SZA joins Kendrick Lamar, her longtime collaborator and former label-mate on Top Dawg Entertainment, at the Super Bowl halftime show. They recently reunited on Lamar’s surprise album GNX and the aforementioned Lana cut. Starting in April, Lamar and SZA will head out together on the Grand National Tour for a number of huge stadium concerts.

SZA stars with Keke Palmer in the new movie One of Them Days. Read Alphonse Pierre’s review of the film, “SZA and Keke Palmer Aim to Join the Buddy-Comedy Canon,” on the Pitch.
